page.title: 11PEOPLE
page.content: We distributed a questionnaire to each of the houses in Alderton which were in our block. We returned one week later to collect them. About 50% of them were completed. We were interested in where the people came from. 35 out of the 46 people were not born locally. The most distant birthplace was Glasgow. Of the local people only 3 were born in the village itself. As most of the houses, according to our survey, are modern this means that local people are not buying the new houses. The average age of the people is 57 which suggests that the younger people cannot afford the new houses. The recreational activities followed reflect the rural area. Swimming was the most popular sporting activity and gardening, walking,reading, television and cookery were favoured pastimes.
